Title: Rose Red
Actors: Nancy Travis, Matt Keeslar, Kimberly J. Brown, David Dukes
Plot: Dr. Joyce Reardon, a psychology professor, leads a team of psychics into the decrepit mansion known as Rose Red. Her efforts unleash the spirit of former owner Ellen Rimbauer and uncover the horrifying secrets of those who lived and died there.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 6 nominations.
